SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am16
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.model.players

Interface PlayAreaModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
PlayArea
public interface PlayAreaModel
Interface to give external classes access to PlayArea-type objects. It contains all the methods a play area is supposed to show to the outside

  • Method Details

    • getPlacementOrder

      List<Position> getPlacementOrder()
      Returns:
      A List containing the Positions of the cards in the order they were placed in.

    • getField

      Map<Position,BoardCard> getField()
      Returns:
      The player's field.

    • getActiveSides

      Map<BoardCard,SideType> getActiveSides()
      Returns:
      The visible side of the cards.

    • checkLegalMove

      boolean checkLegalMove(PlayableCard playedCard, SideType side, Position playedCardPosition)
      Checks whether a move is legal or not by following these three steps:
      1. checks if the position is already occupied;
      2. checks if the playedCard has been placed isolated from the rest of the field;
      3. checks if the playedCard has been placed over a blocked corner;
      4. checks if the playedCard cost is satisfied.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - The card chosen by the player.
      side - The visible side of the card.
      playedCardPosition - The position chosen by the player to place the card.
      Returns:
      true if the move is legal otherwise returns false.

    • getResourceCounts

      Map<ResourceType,Integer> getResourceCounts()
      Returns:
      A map containing the amounts of each resource in the play area.

    • getObjectCounts

      Map<ObjectType,Integer> getObjectCounts()
      Returns:
      A map containing the amounts of each object in the play area.

    • getMinX

      int getMinX()
      Returns:
      The x-coordinate of the left-most played card.

    • getMaxX

      int getMaxX()
      Returns:
      The x-coordinate of the right-most played card.

    • getMinY

      int getMinY()
      Returns:
      The y-coordinate of the down-most played card.

    • getMaxY

      int getMaxY()
      Returns:
      The Y coordinate of the up-most played card.

    • getLegalPositions

      Set<Position> getLegalPositions()
      Returns:
      The set of positions in which a card can be placed.

    • getIllegalPositions

      Set<Position> getIllegalPositions()
      Returns:
      The set of positions in which a card cannot be placed.

    • getAddedLegalPositions

      Set<Position> getAddedLegalPositions()
      Returns:
      The set of placeable positions that were added with the last card placement.

    • getRemovedLegalPositions

      Set<Position> getRemovedLegalPositions()
      Returns:
      The set of positions that were removed from placeablePositions with the last card placement.

    • isDeadlocked

      boolean isDeadlocked()
      Returns:
      Whether the player has no valid moves to make.
